title: Who Is Ralf Schumacher’s Boyfriend? Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne’s Relationship History

author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Fans are eager to learn about Ralf Schumacher's boyfriend. Here's everything to know about the F1 legend's partner and their relationship.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious to discover who Ralf Schumacher’s boyfriend is? The former Formula One driver, known for his impressive racing career, sharp insights as an expert with a lasting legacy in motorsport, has remained a notable figure even after retiring from the track. While his professional achievements are well-documented, many fans have become increasingly curious about his personal life, especially his partner. So, here’s everything you need to know about Schumacher’s boyfriend and their journey together so far. Who is Ralf Schumacher’s boyfriend? Ralf Schumacher is currently dating Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne. A French national, Étienne is an entrepreneur who adores wine and has a deep love for animals and charitable causes. His Instagram account @etienne_bousquet highlights his lively personal endeavors, which he shares with over 20.8K followers. This also includes heartwarming moments spent with Schumacher as well as the F1 icon’s wine brand, Schumacher Wines. Ralf Schumacher and Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne’s relationship history Ralf Schumacher and his boyfriend Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne got acquainted when the latter served as the F1 star’s business manager. As per Daily Mail, the two first met in Monaco. Meanwhile, their professional connection blossomed into a personal relationship in 2022. The duo’s close friend, German actress Carmen Geiss, suggested that they had been together for roughly two years before their relationship was made public. Schumacher and Bousquet-Cassagne’s relationship moved from being private to public in mid-2024, highlighted by the former’s sincere announcement. The revelation occurred when he shared a photo on July 14, 2024, on Instagram. Schumacher captioned it, “The most beautiful thing in life is when you have the right partner by your side with whom you can share everything. “ Over the years, Ralf Schumacher and his boyfriend have often appeared in each other’s social media posts. As per JustJared, the couple was also spotted soaking up the sun on a private yacht and enjoying themselves in St. Tropez, France. This seemingly highlights that Schumacher and Bousquet-Cassagne’s relationship is thriving as of writing.
html:
Curious to discover who Ralf Schumacher’s boyfriend is? The former Formula One driver, known for his impressive racing career, sharp insights as an expert with a lasting legacy in motorsport, has remained a notable figure even after retiring from the track. While his professional achievements are well-documented, many fans have become increasingly curious about his personal life, especially his partner.

So, here’s everything you need to know about Schumacher’s boyfriend and their journey together so far.

Who is Ralf Schumacher’s boyfriend?

Ralf Schumacher is currently dating Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne.

A French national, Étienne is an entrepreneur who adores wine and has a deep love for animals and charitable causes. His Instagram account @etienne_bousquet highlights his lively personal endeavors, which he shares with over 20.8K followers. This also includes heartwarming moments spent with Schumacher as well as the F1 icon’s wine brand, Schumacher Wines.

Ralf Schumacher and Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne’s relationship history

Ralf Schumacher and his boyfriend Étienne Bousquet-Cassagne got acquainted when the latter served as the F1 star’s business manager.

As per Daily Mail, the two first met in Monaco. Meanwhile, their professional connection blossomed into a personal relationship in 2022. The duo’s close friend, German actress Carmen Geiss, suggested that they had been together for roughly two years before their relationship was made public.

Schumacher and Bousquet-Cassagne’s relationship moved from being private to public in mid-2024, highlighted by the former’s sincere announcement. The revelation occurred when he shared a photo on July 14, 2024, on Instagram. Schumacher captioned it, “The most beautiful thing in life is when you have the right partner by your side with whom you can share everything. “

Over the years, Ralf Schumacher and his boyfriend have often appeared in each other’s social media posts. As per JustJared, the couple was also spotted soaking up the sun on a private yacht and enjoying themselves in St. Tropez, France. This seemingly highlights that Schumacher and Bousquet-Cassagne’s relationship is thriving as of writing.
